word: YOUNG PEOPLE ARE CONSTANTLY URGED TO FOLLOW THE ADVICE GIVEN IN 2 PETER 1. BUT MANY REBEL. WHY? BECAUSE WITHOUT A POSITIVE CONCEPT OF GOD AND WHAT HE WISHES TO DO FOR THEM, CHILDREN RELATE TO THEIR CHURCH AND TO GOD OUT OF FEAR OR SHEAR DUTY RATHER THAN ADMIRATION. RELIGION BECOMES OPPRESSIVE, AND IT IS EVENTUALLY REJECTED.
